StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMonthlyAc.vityReportContractRow]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@START_DATE date.me, @END_DATE date.me, @ORG_ID int, @MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR int AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
Declare @MISSION_FY1_START_DATE date.me Declare @MISSION_FY1_END_DATE date.me Declare @MISSION_FY2_START_DATE date.me Declare @MISSION_FY2_END_DATE date.me Declare @MISSION_FY3_START_DATE date.me Declare @MISSION_FY3_END_DATE date.me Declare @PLC_NFO varchar(2) Declare @PLC_GROUND varchar(2) Declare @PLC_NA varchar(2) Declare @PLC_LAW varchar(2) Declare @OCC_NFO varchar(2) Declare @OCC_GROUND varchar(2) Declare @OCC_NA varchar(2) Declare @OCCR_GROUND varchar(2) Declare @OCC_LAW varchar(2)
set @PLC_NFO = '0A'; set @PLC_GROUND = '0B'; set @PLC_NA = '0C'; set @PLC_LAW = '0E'; set @OCC_LAW = '1A'; set @OCC_GROUND = '1B'; set @OCC_NA = '1C'; set @OCCR_GROUND = '1E'; set @OCC_NFO = '1H';
set @MISSION_FY1_START_DATE = CONVERT(date.me, CONVERT(varchar,'7/1/' + str(@MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR+1), 101)); set @MISSION_FY1_END_DATE = CONVERT(date.me, CONVERT(varchar,'6/30/' + str(@MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR+2), 101)); set @MISSION_FY2_START_DATE = CONVERT(date.me, CONVERT(varchar,'7/1/' + str(@MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR+2), 101)); set @MISSION_FY2_END_DATE = CONVERT(date.me, CONVERT(varchar,'6/30/' + str(@MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR+3), 101)); set @MISSION_FY3_START_DATE = CONVERT(date.me, CONVERT(varchar,'7/1/' + str(@MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR+3), 101)); set @MISSION_FY3_END_DATE = CONVERT(date.me, CONVERT(varchar,'6/30/' + str(@MISSION_FISCAL_YEAR+4), 101));
select PLC1_NFO_ALL, PLC1_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE, PLC1_GROUND_ALL, PLC1_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE, PLC1_AIR_ALL, PLC1_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE, PLC1_LAW_ALL, PLC1_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE, PLC2_NFO_ALL, PLC2_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE, PLC2_GROUND_ALL, PLC2_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE, PLC2_AIR_ALL, PLC2_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE, PLC2_LAW_ALL, PLC2_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE, PLC3_NFO_ALL, PLC3_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE, PLC3_GROUND_ALL, PLC3_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE, PLC3_AIR_ALL, PLC3_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE, PLC3_LAW_ALL, PLC3_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE, OCC1_NFO_ALL, OCC1_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE, OCCR1_GROUND_ALL, OCCR1_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE, OCC1_GROUND_ALL, OCC1_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE, OCC1_AIR_ALL, OCC1_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE, OCC1_LAW_ALL, OCC1_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE, OCC2_NFO_ALL, OCC2_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE, OCCR2_GROUND_ALL, OCCR2_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE, OCC2_GROUND_ALL, OCC2_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE, OCC2_AIR_ALL, OCC2_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE, OCC2_LAW_ALL, OCC2_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE, OCC3_NFO_ALL, OCC3_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE, OCCR3_GROUND_ALL, OCCR3_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE, OCC3_GROUND_ALL, OCC3_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE, OCC3_AIR_ALL, OCC3_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE, OCC3_LAW_ALL, OCC3_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE from -----------------------------PLC 1--------------------------------------- (select PLC1_NFO_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_END_DATE, @PLC_NFO)) as PLC1_NFO_ALL, (select PLC1_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_END_DATE, @PLC_NFO)) as PLC1_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE,
(select PLC1_GROUND_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_END_DATE, @PLC_GROUND)) as PLC1_GROUND_ALL, (select PLC1_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_END_DATE, @PLC_GROUND)) as PLC1_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE,
(select PLC1_AIR_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_END_DATE, @PLC_NA)) as PLC1_AIR_ALL, (select PLC1_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_END_DATE, @PLC_NA)) as PLC1_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE,
(select PLC1_LAW_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_END_DATE, @PLC_LAW)) as PLC1_LAW_ALL, (select PLC1_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_END_DATE, @PLC_LAW)) as PLC1_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE,
-----------------------------PLC 2---------------------------------------
(select PLC2_NFO_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_END_DATE, @PLC_NFO)) as PLC2_NFO_ALL, (select PLC2_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_END_DATE, @PLC_NFO)) as PLC2_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE,
(select PLC2_GROUND_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_END_DATE, @PLC_GROUND)) as PLC2_GROUND_ALL, (select PLC2_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_END_DATE, @PLC_GROUND)) as PLC2_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE,
(select PLC2_AIR_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_END_DATE, @PLC_NA)) as PLC2_AIR_ALL, (select PLC2_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_END_DATE, @PLC_NA)) as PLC2_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE,
(select PLC2_LAW_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_END_DATE, @PLC_LAW)) as PLC2_LAW_ALL, (select PLC2_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_END_DATE, @PLC_LAW)) as PLC2_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE,
-----------------------------PLC 3---------------------------------------
(select PLC3_NFO_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_END_DATE, @PLC_NFO)) as PLC3_NFO_ALL, (select PLC3_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_END_DATE, @PLC_NFO)) as PLC3_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE,
(select PLC3_GROUND_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_END_DATE, @PLC_GROUND)) as PLC3_GROUND_ALL, (select PLC3_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_END_DATE, @PLC_GROUND)) as PLC3_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE,
(select PLC3_AIR_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_END_DATE, @PLC_NA)) as PLC3_AIR_ALL, (select PLC3_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_END_DATE, @PLC_NA)) as PLC3_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE,
(select PLC3_LAW_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_END_DATE, @PLC_LAW)) as PLC3_LAW_ALL, (select PLC3_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_END_DATE, @PLC_LAW)) as PLC3_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE,
-----------------------------OCC 1--------------------------------------- (select OCC1_NFO_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_END_DATE, @OCC_NFO)) as OCC1_NFO_ALL, (select OCC1_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_END_DATE, @OCC_NFO)) as OCC1_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE,
(select OCCR1_GROUND_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_END_DATE, @OCCR_GROUND)) as OCCR1_GROUND_ALL, (select OCCR1_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_END_DATE, @OCCR_GROUND)) as OCCR1_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE,
(select OCC1_GROUND_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_END_DATE, @OCC_GROUND)) as OCC1_GROUND_ALL, (select OCC1_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_END_DATE, @OCC_GROUND)) as OCC1_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE,
(select OCC1_AIR_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_END_DATE, @OCC_NA)) as OCC1_AIR_ALL, (select OCC1_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_END_DATE, @OCC_NA)) as OCC1_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE,
(select OCC1_LAW_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_END_DATE, @OCC_LAW)) as OCC1_LAW_ALL, (select OCC1_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY1_END_DATE, @OCC_LAW)) as OCC1_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE,
-----------------------------OCC 2---------------------------------------
(select OCC2_NFO_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_END_DATE, @OCC_NFO)) as OCC2_NFO_ALL, (select OCC2_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_END_DATE, @OCC_NFO)) as OCC2_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE,
(select OCCR2_GROUND_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_END_DATE, @OCCR_GROUND)) as OCCR2_GROUND_ALL, (select OCCR2_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_END_DATE, @OCCR_GROUND)) as OCCR2_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE,
(select OCC2_GROUND_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_END_DATE, @OCC_GROUND)) as OCC2_GROUND_ALL, (select OCC2_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_END_DATE, @OCC_GROUND)) as OCC2_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE,
(select OCC2_AIR_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_END_DATE, @OCC_NA)) as OCC2_AIR_ALL, (select OCC2_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_END_DATE, @OCC_NA)) as OCC2_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE,
(select OCC2_LAW_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_END_DATE, @OCC_LAW)) as OCC2_LAW_ALL, (select OCC2_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY2_END_DATE, @OCC_LAW)) as OCC2_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE,
-----------------------------OCC 3---------------------------------------
(select OCC3_NFO_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_END_DATE, @OCC_NFO)) as OCC3_NFO_ALL, (select OCC3_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_END_DATE, @OCC_NFO)) as OCC3_NFO_NON_WHITE_MALE,
(select OCCR3_GROUND_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_END_DATE, @OCCR_GROUND)) as OCCR3_GROUND_ALL, (select OCCR3_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_END_DATE, @OCCR_GROUND)) as OCCR3_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE,
(select OCC3_GROUND_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_END_DATE, @OCC_GROUND)) as OCC3_GROUND_ALL, (select OCC3_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_END_DATE, @OCC_GROUND)) as OCC3_GROUND_NON_WHITE_MALE,
(select OCC3_AIR_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_END_DATE, @OCC_NA)) as OCC3_AIR_ALL, (select OCC3_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_END_DATE, @OCC_NA)) as OCC3_AIR_NON_WHITE_MALE,
(select OCC3_LAW_ALL = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForAllContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_END_DATE, @OCC_LAW)) as OCC3_LAW_ALL, (select OCC3_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE = usmc.GetMonthlyAc.vityCountForNonWhiteMaleContracts(@START_DATE, @END_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_START_DATE, @MISSION_FY3_END_DATE, @OCC_LAW)) as OCC3_LAW_NON_WHITE_MALE
END
